page.title: 09EDUCATION (PART 2)
page.content: The lessons we have are Mathematics, English,Geography,Religious Education, History,P.E.Art,Science,Swimming, Library and Computers.Mr.Nesbitt comes to teach clarinet and Mrs.Bainbridge the recorders.Last year we went to London for our trip.This year the Juniors are going to Beamish Open Air Museum and the Infs.to South Shields. In the Summer Term we have a special service in Durham Cathedral. Everyone over 11yrs.has to travel to schools or colleges in other villages or towns becouse there are no other schools in our area.They mainly go to Wellfield Comprehensive School.Some children attend Peterlee Shotton Hall Comp. School.Roman Catholic children attend St.Bedes Comp.School in Peterlee.When children are 16yrs.they go to Peterlee Tertiary College,Durham Tech. College or Durham Agricullural College.
